Articles.Content:
Our brand new klx low rider is out now!! 

The normal version have sleek and stylish shape which will make everybody talk about it when it roll down the streets.

We also have mean hydraulics and a pair of crispy sub wafer so you can show all your friends your latest track.

download link: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1miM20UO (go in and just click the download sign on the low rider. craft)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

USER MANUAL 

trusters require some dark magic/ debug to operate.

action group 1 front suspension up

action group 2  front suspension down

action group 3 rear suspension up 

action group 4 rear suspension down

action group 5 doors open

action group 6 doors close

action group 7 hood&trunk open 

action group 8 hood&trunk close

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

game version:

1.2.1

require:

Indicator lights 

https://spacedock.info/mod/566/IndicatorLights

tweakscale

https://spacedock.info/mod/127/TweakScale

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The armored version or the Mafia version which what i like to call is the normal model armored from head to toe.

We also added some weaponry to increase some fire power.

download link: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1hrSzXjA (go in and just click the download sign on the low rider MAFIA . craft)

require:

Indicator lights 

https://spacedock.info/mod/566/IndicatorLights

tweakscale

https://spacedock.info/mod/127/TweakScale

BoomsticksRev3

https://spacedock.info/mod/506/BoomsticksRev3

BDArmoryContinued

https://spacedock.info/mod/867/BDArmoryContinued

PICTURES :http://imgur.com/a/9hye5

 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Feel free to talk to me on steam 

user name THE DOUGONG

i forgot you also need Magic Smoke Industries Infernal Robotics
Oh dam m8 dats so r4d we're in da same gang now.
